hero.title: Where Authentic Connections Pay Off
hero.subtitle: Meet, Chat & Earn with Avalo
hero.description: Experience the next generation of social networking with AI companions, creator monetization, and quality conversations that matter.

features.title: Why Choose Avalo?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to make meaningful connections and earn from your engagement

items.title: Smart Chat System
items.description: Start with free messages. Continue with our unique earn-to-chat model that ensures genuine interest from both sides.

items.title: Creator Economy
items.description: Earn tokens from conversations, tips, and bookings. Track everything in your transparent wallet.

items.title: AI Companions
items.description: Practice conversations and explore personalities with clearly marked AI companions in a separate section.

items.title: Global Discovery
items.description: Connect with people nearby or anywhere in the world with Passport mode and location features.

items.title: Token Economy
items.description: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Buy packages on web, earn through engagement, cash out anytime.

items.title: Royal Club & VIP
items.description: Auto-qualify with 1K+ Instagram followers or consistent earnings. Get better rates and priority features.

wallet.title: Simple, Transparent Tokens
wallet.subtitle: All transactions use tokens for clarity and control
features: Buy token packages on the web

aiSection.title: Practice with AI Companions
aiSection.subtitle: Clearly separated from real dating
aiSection.description: Improve your social skills, explore conversations, and have fun with custom AI companions. All AI chats are clearly marked and in a dedicated section.
features: Clear AI badges on all chats

safety.title: Safety First, Always
safety.subtitle: Multiple layers of protection for peace of mind

features.title: 18+ Age Verification
features.description: Required phone + SMS verification, live selfie with liveness detection, and optional bank authorization.

features.title: Photo Verification
features.description: AI-powered verification ensures real people. Multiple trust levels with visible badges.

features.title: AI Moderation
features.description: Real-time content filtering powered by AI plus human moderator review. Report system with 24/7 support.

features.title: Anti-Bot Protection
features.description: Advanced algorithms detect and remove fake accounts, spam, and suspicious behavior automatically.

benefits: Set your availability with integrated calendar
